wikipedia_page.main: Petronelle Marguerite Mary Cook (née Crouch, May 16, 1925 – September 22, 2016), better known by the pseudonym of Margot Arnold, was a British-born American mystery fiction novelist.

link_mentions.page: List of biographical dictionaries of women writers in English
